column2: Catholic rebels are Catholics who, feeling oppressed by the Protestant majority, have risen up to protect their religion.
Indian Nationalists have for goal the liberation and union of all of India.
Protestant rebels are Protestants who, feeling oppressed by the Catholic majority, have risen up to protect their religion.
Rebellious slaves seek freedom from slavery for themselves and their kind. They have had enough of servitude and will fight to the death to achieve their goal.
Sunni Islamists are zealous jihadis who wage war on those they see as a threat to their religion. They seek to convert others to their cause by force.
